short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for broken links in Notion pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your Notion pages flawless with the Notion Link Checker Chrome extension! This tool automatically checks all the links in your Notion pages, running each link through three different tests to ensure it’s not broken. If any links are found to be broken, they will be clearly identified, and you can quickly see exactly where the issue is, so you can fix it in no time.



Why should you install it?
Free to Start: Begin checking links for free with 300 link checks per month.

Thorough Testing: Each link is tested through three different checks to guarantee accuracy.

Instant Feedback: Broken links are highlighted, and you can see exactly where they are on your page to make quick updates.

Future Enhancements: We’re constantly improving the tool and will soon add more advanced features to make link management even easier!

Install today to keep your Notion pages link-free and error-free!
